title: I bought Yorick yesterday, and upon hitting level 20 got a Yorick shard.
body:
Now, I could just disenchant the Yorick shard for 960 essence.

However, another option is to refund Yorick for his full price in essence, then activate the shard. Doing this effectively grants me an extra 960 essence _(+4800 for refunding Yorick, -2880 to activate the shard, net gain 1920)_.

So the question is, is a refund token worth 960 essence?
